original_text: I have not come down from heaven to do what I myself choose to do. No, my Father has sent me. I have come to do what he wants me to do.
korean_text: 내가 하늘에서 내려온 것은 내 뜻을 행하려 함이 아니요 나를 보내신 이의 뜻을 행하려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: I have not come down from heaven
to do what I myself choose to do
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 스스로 선택한 일을 하기 위함이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: No, my Father has sent me
what he wants me to do
